National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.1.9.4.(2), outlet boxes are permitted to penetrate the membrane of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, provided they are sealed at the penetration by a fire stop that has an FT rating not less than the fire-resistance rating of the fire separation when subjected to the fire test method in ULC CAN/ULC-S115-11 Fire Tests of Firestop Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences  and , outlet boxes are permitted to penetrate the membrane of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, provided they are sealed at the penetration by a fire stop that has an FT rating not less than the fire-resistance rating of the fire separation when subjected to the fire test method in CAN/ULC-S115, "Fire Tests of Firestop Systems".

National Sentence Text: Combustible drain, waste and vent piping is permitted to penetrate a fire separation required to have a fire-resistance rating or a membrane that forms part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, provided the piping is sealed at the penetration by a fire stop that has an F rating not less than the fire-resistance rating required for the fire separation when subjected to the fire test method in ULC CAN/ULC-S115-11 Fire Tests of Firestop Systems with a pressure differential of 50 Pa between the exposed and unexposed sides, with the higher pressure on the exposed side, and the piping is not located in a vertical service space.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided by Sentences  to , combustible piping is permitted to penetrate a fire separation required to have a fire-resistance rating or is permitted to penetrate a membrane that forms part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, provided the piping is sealed at the penetration by a fire stop that has an F rating not less than the fire-resistance rating required for the fire separation when subjected to the fire test method in CAN/ULC-S115, "Fire Tests of Firestop Systems", with a pressure differential of 50 Pa between the exposed and unexposed sides, with the higher pressure on the exposed side.

National Sentence Text: Combustible piping for central vacuum systems is permitted to penetrate a fire separation provided the installation conforms to the requirements that apply to combustible drain, waste and vent piping specified in Sentence 3.1.9.5.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible piping for central vacuum cleaning systems is permitted to penetrate a fire separation, provided the installation conforms to the requirements that apply to combustible piping specified in Sentence .

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.1.10.1.(2), the connections and supports for structural framing members that are connected to or supported on a firewall and have a fire-resistance rating less than that required for the firewall, shall be designed so that the failure of the framing systems during a fire will not affect the integrity of the firewall during the fire.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , the connections and supports for structural framing members that are connected to or supported on a firewall and have a fire-resistance rating less than that required for the firewall, shall be designed so that the failure of the framing systems during a fire will not affect the integrity of the firewall during the fire.

National Sentence Text: Piping, ducts and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways shall be installed so that their collapse will not cause collapse of the firewall.
P/T Sentence Text: Piping, ducts and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways shall be installed so that their collapse will not cause the collapse of the firewall.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.1.10.2.(4), the required fire-resistance rating of a firewall, except for closures, shall be provided by masonry or concrete.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , the required fire-resistance rating of a firewall, except for closures, shall be provided by masonry or concrete.

National Sentence Text: A firewall that separates 2 buildings with roofs at different elevations need not extend above the upper roof surface to form a parapet, provided the difference in elevation between the roofs is more than 3 m.
P/T Sentence Text: A firewall that separates two buildings with roofs at different elevations need not extend above the upper roof surface to form a parapet, provided the difference in elevation between the roofs is more than 3 m.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.1.11.2.(2), fire blocks conforming to Article 3.1.11.7. shall be provided to block off concealed spaces within a wall assembly at every floor level, at every ceiling level where the ceiling forms part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, and so that the maximum horizontal dimension is not more than 20 m and the maximum vertical dimension is not more than 3 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , fire blocks conforming to Article 3.1.11.7. shall be provided to block off concealed spaces within a wall assembly, at every floor level, at every ceiling level where the ceiling forms part of an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating, and so that the maximum horizontal dimension is not more than 20 m and the maximum vertical dimension is not more than 3 m.

National Sentence Text: Fire blocks conforming to Sentence 3.1.11.2. are not required, provided the wall space is filled with insulation, the exposed construction materials and any insulation within the wall space are noncombustible, the exposed materials within the space, including insulation but not including wiring, piping or similar services, have a flame-spread rating not more than 25 on any exposed surface, or on any surface that would be exposed by cutting through the material in any direction, and fire blocks are installed so that the vertical distance between them is not more than 10 m, or the insulated wall assembly contains not more than one concealed air space, and the horizontal thickness of that air space is not more than 25 mm.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire blocks conforming to Sentence  are not required provided, the wall space is filled with insulation, the exposed construction materials and any insulation within the wall space are noncombustible, the exposed materials within the wall space, including insulation but not including wiring, piping or similar services, have a flame-spread rating not more than 25 on any exposed surface, or on any surface that would be exposed by cutting through the material in any direction, and fire blocks are installed so that the vertical distance between them is not more than 10 m, or the insulated wall assembly contains not more than one concealed air space and the horizontal thickness of that air space is not more than 25 mm.

National Article Title: Fire Blocks in Horizontal Concealed Spaces
National Sentence Text: Fire blocks conforming to Sentence 3.1.11.5. are not required where the horizontal concealed space within the floor or roof assembly is entirely filled with noncombustible insulation such that any air gap between the top of the insulation and the floor or roof deck does not exceed 50 mm.
P/T Article Title: 3.1.11.5. Fire Blocks in Horizontal Concealed Spaces
P/T Sentence Text: Sentence  does not apply if the horizontal concealed space within the floor assembly or roof assembly is entirely filled with noncombustible insulation such that any air gap between the top of the insulation and the underside of the floor or roof deck does not exceed 50 mm.

National Sentence Text: Gypsum board not less than 12.7 mm thick and sheet steel not less than 0.38 mm thick need not be tested in conformance with Sentence 3.1.11.7.(1), provided all joints have continuous support.
P/T Sentence Text: Gypsum board not less than 12.7 mm thick and sheet steel not less than 0.38 mm thick need not be tested in conformance with Sentence  provided all joints have continuous support.

National Sentence Text: In a building required to be of noncombustible construction, wood nailing elements described in Article 3.1.5.8. need not be tested in conformance with Sentence 3.1.11.7.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: In a building required to be of noncombustible construction, wood nailing elements described in Article 3.1.5.6. need not be tested in conformance with Sentence .

National Sentence Text: In a building permitted to be of combustible construction, in a combustible roof system permitted by Sentence 3.1.5.3.(2), and in a raised platform permitted by Sentence 3.1.5.10.(2), fire blocks are permitted to be solid lumber or a structural composite lumber product conforming to ASTM D 5456-10a Evaluation of Structural Composite Lumber Products not less than 38 mm thick, phenolic bonded plywood, waferboard, or oriented strandboard not less than 12.5 mm thick with joints supported, or two thicknesses of lumber or a structural composite lumber product conforming to ASTM D 5456-10a Evaluation of Structural Composite Lumber Products each not less than 19 mm thick with joints staggered, where the width or height of the concealed space requires more than one piece of lumber or structural composite lumber product not less than 38 mm thick to block off the space.
P/T Sentence Text: In a building permitted to be of combustible construction, in a combustible roof system permitted by Sentence 3.1.5.3.(2), and in a raised platform permitted by Sentence 3.1.5.8.(2), fire blocks are permitted to be, solid lumber or a structural composite lumber product conforming to ASTM D5456, "Evaluation of Structural Composite Lumber Products", not less than 38 mm thick, phenolic bonded plywood, OSB or waferboard not less than 12.5 mm thick with joints supported, or two thicknesses of lumber or a structural composite lumber product conforming to ASTM D5456, "Evaluation of Structural Composite Lumber Products", each not less than 19 mm thick with joints staggered, where the width or height of the concealed space requires more than one piece of lumber or structural composite lumber product not less than 38 mm thick to block off the space.

National Sentence Text: Except as required by Sentence 3.1.12.1. and as permitted by Sentence 3.1.12.1.(3), the flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification of a material, assembly, or structural member shall be determined on the basis of not less than three tests conducted in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S102-10 Test for Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials and Assemblies
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required by Sentence  and as permitted by Sentence , the flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification of a material, assembly, or structural member shall be determined on the basis of no fewer than three tests conducted in conformance with CAN/ULC-S102, "Test for Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials and Assemblies".

National Sentence Text: Except as otherwise required or permitted by this Subsection, the flame-spread rating of interior wall and ceiling finishes, including glazing and skylights, shall be not more than 150 and shall conform to Table 3.1.13.2.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as otherwise required or permitted by this Subsection, the flame-spread rating of interior wall and ceiling finishes, including glazing and skylights, shall be not more than 150 and shall conform to Table 3.1.13.2.

National Sentence Text: The flame-spread rating of interior wall and ceiling finishes for a bathroom within a suite of residential occupancy shall be not more than 200.
P/T Sentence Text: The flame-spread rating of interior wall and ceiling finishes for a bathroom in a suite of residential occupancy shall be not more than 200.

National Sentence Text: Individual combustible skylights in a corridor that is required to be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation shall be not more than 1 m2 in area and not less than 1.2 m apart.
P/T Sentence Text: Individual combustible skylights in a corridor that is required to be separated from the remainder of the storey by a fire separation shall be not more than 1 m2 in area and not less than 1.2 m apart.

National Sentence Text: Except for a building of Group B major occupancy and elevator cars, the flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification of interior wall, floor and ceiling finishes need not conform to the values in Table 3.1.13.7., provided the building is sprinklered.
P/T Sentence Text: Except for a building of Group B major occupancy and elevator cars, the flame-spread rating and smoke developed classification of interior wall, floor and ceiling finishes need not conform to the values in Table 3.1.13.7., provided the building is sprinklered and the sprinkler system is electrically supervised in conformance with Sentences 3.2.4.10. and 3.2.4.17.(1).

National Sentence Text: Supports for the roof deck assembly referred to in Sentence 3.1.14.1. shall consist of fire-retardant-treated wood, heavy timber construction, noncombustible construction, or a combination thereof.
P/T Sentence Text: Supports for the roof deck assembly referred to in Sentence  shall consist of, fire-retardant treated wood, heavy timber construction, noncombustible construction, or a combination of the items described in Clauses  to (c).

National Sentence Text: Fabrics used as part of an awning, canopy or marquee that is located within or attached to a building of any type of construction shall conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S109-14 Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films
P/T Sentence Text: Fabrics used as part of an awning, canopy or marquee that is located within or attached to a building of any type of construction shall conform to CAN/ULC-S109, "Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films".

National Sentence Text: If a room or group of rooms is intended for different occupancies at different times, the value to be used from Table 3.1.17.1. shall be the value which gives the greatest number of persons for the occupancies concerned.
P/T Sentence Text: If a room or group of rooms is intended for different occupancies at different times, the value to be used from Table 3.1.17.1. shall be the value that gives the greatest number of persons for the occupancies concerned.

National Sentence Text: The building shall be located, the building site shall be graded, or water shall be directed away from building assemblies so as to prevent or accommodate the accumulation of surface water against the building or adjacent buildings.
P/T Sentence Text: The building shall be located and the building site graded so that water will not accumulate at or near the building and will not adversely affect any adjacent properties.

National Sentence Text: A roof-top enclosure provided for elevator machinery, a stairway or a service room used for no purpose other than for service to the building, shall not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height.
P/T Sentence Text: A rooftop enclosure provided for elevator machinery, a stairway or a service room used for no purpose other than for service to the building, shall not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height.

National Sentence Text: Except as required by Sentence 3.2.1.1.(5), the space above a mezzanine need not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height, provided the aggregate area of mezzanines that are not superimposed and do not meet the conditions of Sentence 3.2.1.1. does not exceed 10% of the floor area in which they are located, and the area of a mezzanine in a suite does not exceed 10% of the area of that suite.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required by Sentence , the space above a mezzanine need not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height provided, the aggregate area of mezzanines that are not superimposed and do not meet the conditions of Sentence  does not exceed 10% of the floor area in which they are located, and the area of mezzanine in a suite does not exceed 10% of the area of that suite.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.1.1.(6), each level of mezzanine that is partly or wholly superimposed above the first level of mezzanine shall be considered as a storey in calculating the building height.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentences  and , each level of mezzanine that is partly or wholly superimposed above the first level of mezzanine shall be considered as a storey in calculating the building height.

National Sentence Text: Platforms intended solely for periodic inspection and elevated maintenance catwalks need not be considered as floor assemblies or mezzanines for the purpose of calculating building height, provided they are not used for storage, and they are constructed with noncombustible materials, unless the building is permitted to be of combustible construction.
P/T Sentence Text: Platforms intended solely for periodic inspection and elevated catwalks need not be considered as floor assemblies or mezzanines for the purpose of determining building height provided, they are not used for storage, they are constructed with noncombustible materials unless the building is permitted to be of combustible construction, and where they are intended to be occupied, they have an occupant load of not more than four persons.

National Sentence Text: All loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting a floor assembly immediately above a basement shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required by Sentence 3.2.1.4. for the floor assembly.
P/T Sentence Text: All loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting a floor assembly immediately above a basement shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required by Sentence  for the floor assembly.

National Sentence Text: An open-air storey need not conform to Sentence 3.2.1.5.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: An open-air storey need not conform to Sentence .

National Sentence Text: In determining the fire safety requirements of a building in relation to each of the major occupancies contained therein, the building height and building area of the entire building shall be used.
P/T Sentence Text: In determining the fire safety requirements of a building in relation to each of the major occupancies contained in it, the building height and building area of the entire building shall be used.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 3.2.2.8. and Sentence 3.2.2.18.(2), in a building in which one major occupancy is located entirely above another major occupancy, the requirements in this Subsection for each portion of the building containing a major occupancy shall apply to that portion as if the entire building were of that major occupancy.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.8. and Sentences 3.2.2.43A. and 3.2.2.50A.(4), in a building in which one major occupancy is located entirely above another major occupancy, the requirements in this Subsection for each portion of the building containing a major occupancy shall apply to that portion as if the entire building was of that major occupancy.

National Sentence Text: A building is considered to face 2 streets provided not less than 50% of the building perimeter is located within 15 m of the street or streets.
P/T Sentence Text: A building is considered to face two streets provided not less than 50% of the building perimeter is located within 15 m of a street or streets.

National Sentence Text: A roof-top enclosure for elevator machinery or for a service room, not more than one storey high, is not required to have a fire-resistance rating.
P/T Sentence Text: A rooftop enclosure for elevator machinery or for a service room, not more than 1 storey high, is not required to have a fire-resistance rating.

National Sentence Text: If a building is erected entirely below the adjoining finished ground level and does not extend more than one storey below that ground level, the minimum precautions against fire spread and collapse shall be the same as are required for basements under a building of 1 storey in building height having the same occupancy and building area.
P/T Sentence Text: If a building is erected entirely below the adjoining finished ground level and does not extend more than 1 storey below that ground level, the minimum precautions against fire spread and collapse shall be the same as are required for basements under a building of 1 storey in building height having the same occupancy and building area.

National Article Title: Group A, Division 1, One Storey, Limited Area, Sprinklered
National Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.21. is permitted to be of heavy timber construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or of heavy timber construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly, or be of heavy timber construction.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.21. Group A, Division 1, 1 Storey, Limited Area
P/T Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence  is permitted to be of heavy timber construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations, with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or of heavy timber construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly, or be of heavy timber construction.

National Article Title: 3.2.2.24. Group A, Division 2, up to 6 Storeys, Any Area, Sprinklered
National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.16., the building referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.75. shall be of noncombustible construction, and floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.24. Group A, Division 2, up to 6 Storeys, Any Area, Sprinklered
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Article 3.2.2.16., the building referred to in Sentence  shall be of noncombustible construction, and,  floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h,  mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, and  all loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly.

National Article Title: Group A, Division 2, up to 2 Storeys
National Sentence Text: A building classified as Group A, Division 2 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.25. provided it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than the value in Table 3.2.2.25.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.25. Group A, Division 2, up to 2 Storeys
P/T Sentence Text: A building classified as Group A, Division 2 is permitted to conform to Sentence  provided, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than the value in Table 3.2.2.25.

National Article Title: Group A, Division 2, up to 2 Storeys, Increased Area, Sprinklered
National Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.26. is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and floor assemblies shall be fire separations and, if of combustible construction, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.26. Group A, Division 2, up to 2 Storeys, Increased Area,
P/T Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence  is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations and, if of combustible construction, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less 45 min, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction.

National Sentence Text: A building classified as Group A, Division 2 is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction, used singly or in combination, provided it is not more than 1 storey in building height, and except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.28.(2), it has a building area not more than 400 m2 if facing one street, 500 m2 if facing 2 streets, or 600 m2 if facing 3 streets.
P/T Sentence Text: A building classified as Group A, Division 2 is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly or in combination, provided, it is not more than 1 storey in building height, and except as permitted by Sentence , it has a building area not more than, 400 m2 if facing one street, 500 m2 if facing two streets, or 600 m2 if facing three streets.

National Sentence Text: In a building referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.28. without a basement, the building area limits of Sentence 3.2.2.28. are permitted to be doubled provided a fire separation with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h is used to separate the building into fire compartments, each one of which does not exceed the limits of Clause 3.2.2.28.(1)(b).
P/T Sentence Text: In a building referred to in Sentence  without a basement, the building area limits of Sentence  are permitted to be doubled provided a fire separation with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h is used to separate the building into fire compartments, each one of which does not exceed the area limits of Clause (b).

National Article Title: Group A, Division 3, up to 2 Storeys
National Sentence Text: A building classified as Group A, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.30. provided it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than the value in Table 3.2.2.30.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.30. Group A, Division 3, up to 2 Storeys
P/T Sentence Text: A building classified as Group A, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence  provided, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than the value in Table 3.2.2.30.

National Article Title: Group A, Division 1, One Storey, Sprinklered
National Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.22. is permitted to be of combustible construction or noncombustible construction used singly, or in combination, and floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, mezzanines shall have, if of combustible construction, a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting an assembly required to have a fire-resistance rating shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of noncombustible construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches supporting a fire separation shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the fire separation.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.30. Group A, Division 3, up to 2 Storeys
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Clauses  and (d), the building referred to in Sentence  shall be of noncombustible construction, and, floor assemblies shall be fire separations with a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, mezzanines shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h, roof assemblies shall, have a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min, or be of heavy timber construction, and loadbearing walls, columns and arches shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the supported assembly, except that arches and structural members within the storey immediately below a roof assembly are permitted to be of heavy timber construction.

National Article Title: Group A, Division 3, up to 2 Storeys

National Article Title: Group F, Division 3, One Storey, Any Area, Low Fire Load Occupancy
National Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence 3.2.2.89. shall be of noncombustible construction.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.2.82. Group F, Division 3, 1 Storey, Any Area, Low Fire Load Occupancy
P/T Sentence Text: The building referred to in Sentence  shall be of noncombustible construction.

National Article Title: Limiting Distance and Area of Unprotected Openings
National Sentence Text: The spacing between individual unprotected openings described in Sentence 3.2.3.1. that serve a single room or space described in Sentence 3.2.3.1. shall not be less than 2 m horizontally of another unprotected opening that is on the same exposing building face and serves the single room or space, or 2 m vertically of another unprotected opening that serves the single room or space, or another room or space on the same storey.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.3.1. Limiting Distance and Area of Unprotected Openings
P/T Sentence Text: The distance between individual unprotected openings described in Sentence  that serve a single room or space described in Sentence  shall not be less than, 2 m measured horizontally where the unprotected openings are on the same exposing building face, or 2 m measured vertically where the unprotected openings both serve, the single room or space, or another room or space on the same storey.

National Article Title: Limiting Distance and Area of Unprotected Openings
National Sentence Text: For the purpose of Sentence 3.2.3.1.(6), "single room or space" shall mean two or more adjacent spaces having a full-height separating wall extending less than 1.5 m from the interior face of the exterior wall, or two or more stacked spaces that are on the same storey.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.3.1. Limiting Distance and Area of Unprotected Openings
P/T Sentence Text: For the purpose of Sentence , "single room or space" means a room or space that, is not divided by a wall, is divided by, a wall that extends less than 1.5 m from the interior face of the exterior wall, or a partial height wall, or consists of two or more stacked spaces that are on the same storey.

National Article Title: Limiting Distance and Area of Unprotected Openings
National Sentence Text: Unless a closure used to protect an opening in an exposing building face has a protective performance equivalent to that required for the wall assembly in which it is located, an equivalent area of unprotected opening, determined in accordance with the procedures of Sentence 3.2.3.1. shall be added to the greater of the actual area of unprotected openings, or the corrected area of unprotected openings.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.3.1. Limiting Distance and Area of Unprotected Openings
P/T Sentence Text: Unless a closure used to protect an opening in an exposing building face has a protective performance equivalent to that required for the wall assembly in which it is located, an equivalent area of unprotected opening, determined in accordance with the procedures of Sentence  shall be added to the greater of, the actual area of unprotected openings, or the corrected area of unprotected openings.

National Sentence Text: In a building that is sprinklered throughout and contains an interconnected floor space, the area of the exposing building face for the interconnected floor space is permitted to be determined by considering each storey as a separate fire compartment notwithstanding openings through the floor assemblies.
P/T Sentence Text: In a building that contains an interconnected floor space, the area of the exposing building face for the interconnected floor space is permitted to be determined by considering each storey as a separate fire compartment notwithstanding openings through the floor assemblies.

National Article Title: Wall with Limiting Distance Less Than 1.2 m
National Sentence Text: Wired glass or glass block shall not be used for a closure referred to in Sentence 3.2.3.5.(1).
P/T Article Title: 3.2.3.5. Wall With Limiting Distance Less Than 1.2 m
P/T Sentence Text: Wired glass or glass block shall not be used for a closure referred to in Sentence .

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.3.6.(4), where the exposing building face has a limiting distance of not more than 0.45 m, projecting roof soffits shall not be constructed above the exposing building face. (See Note A-3.2.3.6.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence (3.1), where the exposing building face has a limiting distance of not more than 0.45 m, projecting roof soffits shall not be constructed above the exposing building face. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence 3.2.3.6.(4), where the exposing building face has a limiting distance of more than 0.45 m, the face of roof soffits shall not project to less than 0.45 m from the property line. (See Note A-3.2.3.6.(2).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence (3.1), where the exposing building face has a limiting distance of more than 0.45 m, the face of roof soffits above the exposing building face shall not project to less than 0.45 m from the property line.(3.1) Subject to Sentence , the face of a roof soffit is permitted to project to the property line, where it faces a street, lane or public thoroughfare.

National Sentence Text: Where roof soffits project to less than 1.2 m from the centre line of a lane or public thoroughfare, or from an imaginary line between two buildings or fire compartments on the same property, they shall have no openings, and be protected by not less than 0.38 mm thick sheet steel, unvented aluminum conforming to CGSB CAN/CGSB-93.2-M91 Prefinished Aluminum Siding, Soffits, and Fascia, for Residential Use not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum soffit board or gypsum ceiling board installed according to CSA A82.31-M1980 Gypsum Board Application not less than 11 mm thick plywood, not less than 12.5 mm thick OSB or waferboard, or not less than 11 mm thick lumber.
P/T Sentence Text: Where roof soffits project to less than 1.2 m from the centre line of a lane or public thoroughfare or from an imaginary line between two buildings or fire compartments on the same property, they shall, have no openings, and be protected by, not less than 0.38 mm thick sheet steel, unvented aluminum conforming to CAN/CGSB-93.2-M, "Prefinished Aluminum Siding, Soffits and Fascia, for Residential Use", not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum soffit board or gypsum ceiling board installed according to CSA A82.31 M, "Gypsum Board Application", not less than 11 mm thick plywood, not less than 12.5 mm thick OSB or waferboard, or not less than 11 mm thick lumber.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 3.1.4.8., the requirement in Table 3.2.3.7. for noncombustible cladding for buildings or fire compartments where the maximum permitted area of unprotected openings is more than 10% of the exposing building face is permitted to be waived for exterior wall assemblies that comply with Article 3.1.5.5.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided by Sentences  to , cladding for buildings or fire compartments where the maximum permitted area of unprotected openings is more than 10% of the exposing building face need not be noncombustible where the wall assembly complies with the requirements of Sentences 3.1.5.5.(1), when tested in conformance with CAN/ULC-S134, Fire Test of Exterior Wall Assemblies".

National Sentence Text: Structural members of heavy timber construction, including beams, columns and arches, that are placed wholly or partly outside the exterior face of a building and are 3 m or more from the property line or the centre line of a public thoroughfare need not be covered with noncombustible cladding.
P/T Sentence Text: Structural members of heavy timber construction, including beams, columns and arches, placed wholly or partly outside an exterior face of a building and 3 m or more from the property line or centreline of a public thoroughfare need not be covered with noncombustible cladding.

National Sentence Text: An exposing building face in a storage garage with all storeys constructed as open-air storeys is permitted to have unlimited unprotected openings provided it has a limiting distance not less than 3 m.
P/T Sentence Text: An exposing building face of an open-air storey in a storage garage is permitted to have unlimited unprotected openings provided it has a limiting distance not less than 3 m.

National Article Title: Low Fire Load, One Storey Building
National Sentence Text: An exposing building face of a building of low-hazard industrial occupancy conforming to Article 3.2.2.89. is permitted to be of noncombustible construction without a fire-resistance rating provided it is not a loadbearing wall, and the limiting distance is not less than 3 m.
P/T Sentence Text: An exposing building face of a building of low hazard industrial occupancy conforming to Article 3.2.2.82. is permitted to be of noncombustible construction without a fire-resistance rating provided, it is not a loadbearing wall, and the limiting distance is not less than 3 m.

National Sentence Text: If an unenclosed exterior exit stair or ramp could be exposed to fire from an opening in the exterior wall of the building it serves, the opening in the exterior wall of the building shall be protected in conformance with the requirements of Sentence 3.2.3.13. where the opening in the exterior wall of the building is within 3 m horizontally and less than 10 m below the exit stair or ramp, or less than 5 m above the exit stair or ramp.
P/T Sentence Text: If an unenclosed exterior exit stair or ramp could be exposed to fire from an opening in the exterior wall of the building it serves, the opening in the exterior wall of the building shall be protected in conformance with the requirements of Sentence  where the opening in the exterior wall of the building is within 3 m horizontally and, less than 10 m below the exit stair or ramp, or less than 5 m above the exit stair or ramp.

National Sentence Text: The exterior wall of each fire compartment referred to in Sentence 3.2.3.14. within the distance, Do, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the interior vertical fire separation between the fire compartment and the remainder of the building.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.3.14. Wall Exposed to Another Wall (See Appendix A.)
P/T Sentence Text: The exterior wall of each fire compartment referred to in Sentence  within the distance, DO, shall have a fire-resistance rating not less than that required for the interior vertical fire separation between the fire compartment and the remainder of the building.

National Sentence Text: If an eave overhang is completely separated from the remainder of the attic or roof space by the use of fire blocks, the requirements of Sentence 3.2.3.16. do not apply.
P/T Sentence Text: If an eave overhang is completely separated from the remainder of the attic or roof space by fire blocks, the requirements of Sentence  do not apply.

National Sentence Text: The protection required by Sentence 3.2.3.16. for projections is permitted to be omitted if the fire compartments behind the window and door openings are sprinklered in accordance with Article 3.2.5.12., and all rooms, including closets and bathrooms, having openings in the wall beneath the soffit are sprinklered, notwithstanding exceptions permitted in the standards referenced in Article 3.2.5.12. for the installation of automatic sprinkler systems.
P/T Sentence Text: The protection required by Sentence  for projections is permitted to be omitted if, the fire compartments behind the window and door openings are sprinklered in accordance with Article 3.2.5.13., and all rooms, including closets and bathrooms, having openings in the wall beneath the soffit are sprinklered, notwithstanding exceptions permitted in the standards referenced in Article 3.2.5.13. for the installation of automatic sprinkler systems.

National Article Title: Canopy Protection for Vertically Separated Openings
National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.3.17.(3), the canopy required by Sentence 3.2.3.17. is permitted to be omitted if the exterior wall of the upper storey is recessed not less than 1 m behind the exterior wall containing the opening in the lower storey.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.3.17. Canopy Protection for Vertically Separated Openings
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , the canopy required by Sentence  is permitted to be omitted if the exterior wall of the upper storey is recessed not less than 1 m behind the exterior wall containing the opening in the lower storey.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.3.19.(3), a walkway connected to a building required to be of noncombustible construction shall also be of noncombustible construction.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , a walkway connected to a building required to be of noncombustible construction shall also be of noncombustible construction.

National Sentence Text: An underground walkway shall not be designed or used for any purpose other than pedestrian travel unless the purpose is acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, and sprinklers are installed in any space in the walkway containing an occupancy.
P/T Sentence Text: An underground walkway shall not be designed or used for any purpose other than pedestrian travel unless, the purpose is permitted, and sprinklers are installed in any space in the walkway containing an occupancy.

National Article Title: Determination of Requirement for a Fire Alarm System
National Sentence Text: Where each dwelling unit in an apartment building that is not sprinklered has direct access to an exterior exit facility leading to ground level, a fire alarm system is not required if not more than 4 dwelling units share a common means of egress, or the building is not more than 3 storeys in building height.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.1. Determination of Requirement for a Fire Alarm System
P/T Sentence Text: If each dwelling unit has direct access to an exterior exit facility leading to ground level, a fire alarm system is not required in an apartment building, in which not more than four dwelling units share a common means of egress, or that is not more than 3 storeys in building height.

National Article Title: Determination of Requirement for a Fire Alarm System
National Sentence Text: A fire alarm system is not required in a hotel or motel 3 storeys or less in building height that is contained in a building that is not sprinklered provided each suite has direct access to an exterior exit facility leading to ground level.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.1. Determination of Requirement for a Fire Alarm System
P/T Sentence Text: A fire alarm system is not required in a hotel 3 storeys or less in building height provided each suite has direct access to an exterior exit facility leading to ground level.

National Article Title: Determination of Requirement for a Fire Alarm System
National Sentence Text: A fire alarm system is not required in a storage garage conforming to Article 3.2.2.90. that is contained in a building that is not sprinklered provided there are no other occupancies in the building.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.1. Determination of Requirement for a Fire Alarm System
P/T Sentence Text: A fire alarm system is not required in a storage garage conforming to Article 3.2.2.83. provided there are no other occupancies in the building.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.4.2.(6), if there are openings through a firewall, other than those for piping, tubing, wiring and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways, the requirements in this Subsection shall apply to the floor areas on both sides of the firewall as if they were in the same building.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , if there are openings through a firewall, other than those for piping, tubing, wiring and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways, the requirements in this Subsection shall apply to the floor areas on both sides of the firewall as if they were in the same building.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.4.2.(4), if a building contains more than one major occupancy and a fire alarm system is required, a single system shall serve all occupancies.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , if a building contains more than one major occupancy and a fire alarm system is required, a single system shall serve all occupancies.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.4.2.(4), if a fire alarm system is required in any portion of a building, it shall be installed throughout the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , if a fire alarm system is required in any portion of a building, it shall be installed throughout the building.

National Sentence Text: Except as required by Sentence 3.2.4.2.(5), the requirements in this Subsection are permitted to be applied to each portion of a building not more than 3 storeys in building height, in which a vertical fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h separates the portion from the remainder of the building as if it were a separate building, provided there are no openings through the fire separation, other than those for piping, tubing, wiring and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required by Sentence , the requirements in this Subsection are permitted to be applied to each portion of a building not more than 3 storeys in building height, in which a vertical fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h separates the portion from the remainder of the building as if it were a separate building, provided there are no openings through the fire separation, other than those for piping, tubing, wiring and totally enclosed noncombustible raceways.

National Sentence Text: The permission in Sentence 3.2.4.2. to consider separated portions of a building as separate buildings does not apply to service rooms and storage rooms.
P/T Sentence Text: The permission in Sentence  to consider separated portions of a building as separate buildings does not apply to service rooms and storage rooms.

National Article Title: Installation and Verification of Fire Alarm Systems
National Sentence Text: Fire alarm systems, including the voice communication capability where provided, shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.5. Installation and Verification of Fire Alarm Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Fire alarm systems, including those with voice communication capability, shall be installed in conformance with CAN/ULC-S524, "Installation of Fire Alarm Systems".

National Article Title: Installation and Verification of Fire Alarm Systems
National Sentence Text: Fire alarm systems shall be verified in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems to ensure they are operating satisfactorily.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.5. Installation and Verification of Fire Alarm Systems
P/T Sentence Text: A fire alarm system shall be verified in conformance with CAN/ULC-S537, "Verification of Fire Alarm Systems", to ensure satisfactory operation.

National Sentence Text: A fire alarm system that includes waterflow-indicating devices shall be designed to notify the fire department in conformance with Sentence 3.2.4.7. when an alarm is initiated.
P/T Sentence Text: A fire alarm system that includes waterflow indicating devices shall be designed to notify the fire department, in conformance with Sentence , that an alarm has been initiated.

National Sentence Text: A 2-stage fire alarm system shall be designed to notify the fire department, in conformance with Sentence 3.2.4.7.(4), that an alert signal has been initiated.
P/T Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system is required to be installed and a two stage system is provided, the system shall be designed to notify the fire department, in conformance with Sentence , that an alert signal has been initiated.

National Sentence Text: An annunciator need not be provided for a fire alarm system if not more than one zone indicator is required by Sentence 3.2.4.8.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: An annunciator need not be provided for a fire alarm system if not more than one zone indicator is required in Sentence .

National Sentence Text: If an annunciator is not installed as part of a fire alarm system in conformance with Sentence 3.2.4.8.(1), a visual and audible trouble signal device shall be provided inside the main entrance of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: If an annunciator is not installed as part of a fire alarm system in conformance with Sentence , a visual and audible trouble signal device shall be provided inside the main entrance of the building.

National Sentence Text: A fire alarm control unit installed in close proximity to a building entrance that faces a street or an access route for fire department vehicles that complies with Sentence 3.2.5.5. is deemed to satisfy the requirement for an annunciator, provided all indicators required for an annunciator or trouble signal device are included on the control unit.
P/T Sentence Text: A fire alarm control unit installed in close proximity to a building entrance that faces a street or an access route for fire department vehicles that complies with Sentence 3.2.5.5.(1), is deemed to satisfy the requirement for an annunciator provided all indicators required for an annunciator or trouble signal device are included on the control unit. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system in a building is required to have an annunciator by Sentence 3.2.4.8.(1), except for hose valves, all valves controlling water supplies in a standpipe system shall be equipped with an electrically supervised switch for transmitting a trouble signal to the annunciator in the event of movement of the valve handle.
P/T Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system in a building is required by Sentence 3.2.4.9. to have an annunciator, each valve controlling water supplies in a standpipe system, except for hose valves, shall be equipped with an electrically supervised switch for transmitting a trouble signal to the annunciator in the event of movement of the valve handle.

National Sentence Text: A fire pump shall be electrically supervised as stipulated in NFPA 20-2016 Installation of Stationary Pumps for Fire Protection
P/T Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system is installed in a building, a fire pump shall be electrically supervised in accordance with NFPA 20, "Installation of Stationary Pumps for Fire Protection".

National Sentence Text: Indication of a supervisory signal in accordance with Sentence 3.2.4.9. shall be transmitted to the fire department in conformance with Sentence 3.2.4.7.(4).
P/T Sentence Text: In a building regulated by the provisions of Subsection 3.2.6., the indication of a supervisory signal in accordance with Sentence  shall be transmitted to a proprietary control centre or to an independent central station.

National Sentence Text: Fire detectors required by this Code shall be connected to the fire alarm system.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire detectors required by this Article shall be connected to the fire alarm system.

National Sentence Text: Smoke detectors required in the sleeping rooms of a care, treatment or detention occupancy shall, upon actuation, provide an audible and visible signal to staff serving those rooms so that the room or location containing the actuated smoke detector can be easily identified. (See Note A-3.2.4.11.(3).)
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke detectors required in sleeping rooms of care, care and treatment or detention occupancy shall upon actuation provide an audible and visible signal to staff serving those rooms so that the room or location containing the smoke detector can be easily identified. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: Smoke detectors installed at the entrance to the walkways in conformance with Article 3.1.8.14. shall be deemed to meet the requirements of Sentence 3.2.4.11.(5).
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke detectors installed at the entrance to a walkway in conformance with Article 3.1.8.12. are deemed to meet the requirements of Sentence .

National Sentence Text: Smoke detectors required by Sentence 3.2.4.11. may be replaced with fire detectors in Group F occupancies where the smoke detectors may be subjected to false alarms due to the activities within the building.
P/T Sentence Text: Fire detectors are permitted to be installed in lieu of the smoke detectors required by Sentence  in Group F occupancies where the smoke detectors may be subjected to false alarms due to the activities within the building.

National Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system is installed, an air-handling system shall be designed to prevent the circulation of smoke upon a signal from a duct-type smoke detector if the air-handling system serves more than one storey, serves more than one suite in a storey, or serves more than one fire compartment required by Sentence 3.3.3.5.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system is installed, an air handling system shall be designed to prevent the circulation of smoke upon a signal from a duct-type smoke detector if the air handling system, serves more than 1 storey, serves more than one suite in a storey, serves more than one fire compartment required by Sentence 3.3.3.5. or Sentence 3.3.4.11.(2), or is not provided with fire dampers as permitted by Sentence 3.1.8.8.(4).

National Sentence Text: Smoke detectors required by Sentence 3.2.4.14. shall be designed as part of the building fire alarm system.
P/T Sentence Text: Smoke detectors required by Sentence  shall be designed as part of the building fire alarm system.

National Sentence Text: The alternate floor recall feature required by Sentence 3.2.4.14. is not required if the floor area containing the recall level is sprinklered throughout.
P/T Sentence Text: The alternate floor recall feature required by Sentence  is not required if the floor area containing the recall level is sprinklered.

National Sentence Text: An automatic sprinkler system shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices and, if an annunciator is required by Article 3.2.4.8., shall be installed so that each device serves not more than one storey, and an area on each storey that is not more than the system area limits as specified in NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems
P/T Sentence Text: An automatic sprinkler system shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices and, if an annunciator is required by Article 3.2.4.9., shall be installed so that each device serves, not more than 1 storey, and an area on each storey that is not more than the system area limits as specified in NFPA 13, "Installation of Sprinkler Systems".

National Sentence Text: Waterflow-detecting devices required by Sentence 3.2.4.15. shall be connected to the fire alarm system so that, upon its actuation, an alert signal or an alarm signal is initiated.
P/T Sentence Text: If a fire alarm system is provided, waterflow indicating devices required by Sentence  shall be connected to the fire alarm system so that on actuation an alert signal or an alarm signal is initiated.

National Sentence Text: In a building that is sprinklered throughout, a manual station is not required at an exterior egress doorway from a suite that does not lead to an interior shared means of egress in a hotel or motel not more than 3 storeys in building height, provided each suite is served by an exterior exit facility leading directly to ground level.
P/T Sentence Text: In a building that is sprinklered, a manual pull station is not required at an exterior egress doorway from a suite that does not lead to an interior shared means of egress in a hotel not more than 3 storeys in building height, provided each suite is served by an exterior exit facility leading directly to ground level.

National Sentence Text: In a building that is sprinklered throughout, a manual station is not required at an exterior egress doorway from a dwelling unit that does not lead to an interior shared means of egress in a building not more than 3 storeys in building height containing only dwelling units, provided each dwelling unit is served by an exterior exit facility leading directly to ground level.
P/T Sentence Text: In a building that is sprinklered, a manual pull station is not required at an exterior egress doorway from a dwelling unit that does not lead to an interior shared means of egress in a building not more than 3 storeys in building height containing only dwelling units, provided each dwelling unit is served by an exterior exit facility leading directly to ground level.

National Sentence Text: The sound patterns of alert signals shall be significantly different from the temporal patterns of alarm signals. (See Note A-3.2.4.18.(3).)
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.20. Audibility of Alarm Systems (See Appendix A.)
P/T Sentence Text: The sound patterns of alert signals shall be significantly different from the temporal patterns of alarm signals. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: The sound pressure level in a sleeping room from a fire alarm audible signal device shall be not less than 75 dBA in a building of residential or care occupancy when any intervening doors between the device and the sleeping room are closed. (See Note A-3.2.4.18.(5).)
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.20. Audibility of Alarm Systems (See Appendix A.)
P/T Sentence Text: The sound pressure level in a sleeping room from a fire alarm audible signal device shall be not less than 75 dBA in a building of residential occupancy when any intervening doors between the device and the sleeping room are closed. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.4.18.(11), audible signal devices located within a dwelling unit shall include a means for them to be manually silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which time the devices shall restore themselves to normal operation. (See Note A-3.2.4.18.(7).)
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.20. Audibility of Alarm Systems (See Appendix A.)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , an audible signal device located within a dwelling unit shall incorporate a means that enables the device to be silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the device shall restore to normal operation. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: Audible signal devices shall be installed in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1. and shall be connected to the fire alarm system.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.4.20. Audibility of Alarm Systems (See Appendix A.)
P/T Sentence Text: Audible signal devices shall be installed in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1. and shall be connected to the fire alarm system.

National Sentence Text: At least one smoke alarm shall be installed on each storey of a dwelling unit or suite of care occupancy.
P/T Sentence Text: At least one smoke alarm shall be installed on each storey and mezzanine of a dwelling unit.

National Article Title: Voice Communication Systems for High Buildings
National Sentence Text: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence 3.2.4.22. shall include a means to silence the alarm signal in a single stage fire alarm system while voice instructions are being transmitted, but only after the alarm signal has initially sounded for not less than 30 s.
P/T Sentence Text: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence  shall include a means to silence the alarm signal in a single-stage fire alarm system while voice messages are being transmitted, but only after the alarm signal has initially sounded for not less than 30 s.

National Article Title: Voice Communication Systems for High Buildings
National Sentence Text: The voice communication system referred to in Clause 3.2.4.22.(1) shall be designed so that the alarm signal in a 2-stage fire alarm system can be selectively transmitted to any zone or zones while maintaining an alert signal or selectively transmitting voice instructions to any other zone or zones in the building.
P/T Sentence Text: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence  shall be designed so that the alarm signal in a two-stage fire alarm system can be selectively transmitted to any zone or zones while maintaining an alert signal or selectively transmitting voice instructions to any other zone or zones in the building.

National Article Title: Voice Communication Systems for High Buildings
National Sentence Text: The 2-way communication system referred to in Clause 3.2.4.22.(1) shall be installed so that emergency telephones are located in each floor area near exit stair shafts.
P/T Sentence Text: The voice communication system referred to in Sentence  shall be installed so that emergency communication devices are located in each floor area near exit stair shafts.

National Sentence Text: An opening for access required by Sentence 3.2.5.1. shall have a sill no higher than 900 mm above the inside floor, and be not less than 1 100 mm high by not less than 550 mm wide for a building not designed for the storage or use of dangerous goods, or 750 mm wide for a building designed for the storage or use of dangerous goods.
P/T Sentence Text: An opening for access required by Sentence  shall, have a sill no higher than 1 070 mm above the inside floor, and be not less than 1 100 mm high by not less than, 550 mm wide for a building not designed for the storage or use of dangerous goods, or 750 mm wide for a building designed for the storage or use of dangerous goods.

National Sentence Text: Direct access from at least one street shall be provided from the outdoors in a building that is not sprinklered to each basement having a horizontal dimension more than 25 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Direct access from at least one street shall be provided from the outdoors to each basement, that is not sprinklered, and that has horizontal dimension more than 25 m.

National Sentence Text: The access required by Sentence 3.2.5.2. is permitted to be provided by doors, windows or other means that provide an opening not less than 1 100 mm high and 550 mm wide, with a sill no higher than 900 mm above the inside floor, or an interior stairway immediately accessible from the outdoors.
P/T Sentence Text: The access required by Sentence  is permitted to be provided by, doors, windows or other means that provide an opening not less than 1 100 mm high and 550 mm wide, with a sill no higher than 900 mm above the inside floor, or an interior stairway immediately accessible from the outdoors

National Sentence Text: Access routes shall be provided to a building so that for a building provided with a fire department connection, a fire department pumper vehicle can be located adjacent to the hydrants referred to in Article 3.2.5.15., for a building not provided with a fire department connection, a fire department pumper vehicle can be located so that the length of the access route from a hydrant to the vehicle plus the unobstructed path of travel for the firefighter from the vehicle to the building is not more than 90 m, and the unobstructed path of travel for the firefighter from the vehicle to the building is not more than 45 m.
P/T Sentence Text: Access routes shall be provided to a building so that, for a building provided with a fire department connection, a fire department pumper vehicle can be located adjacent to the hydrants referred to in Article 3.2.5.16., for a building not provided with a fire department connection, a fire department pumper vehicle can be located so that the length of the access route from a hydrant to the vehicle plus the unobstructed path of travel for the firefighter from the vehicle to the building is not more than 90 m, and the unobstructed path of travel for the firefighter from the vehicle to the building is not more than 45 m.

National Sentence Text: The unobstructed path of travel for the firefighter required by Sentence 3.2.5.5. from the vehicle to the building shall be measured from the vehicle to the fire department connection provided for the building, except that if no fire department connection is provided, the path of travel shall be measured to the principal entrance of the building.
P/T Sentence Text: The unobstructed path of travel for the firefighter required by Sentence  from the vehicle to the building shall be measured from the vehicle to the fire department connection provided for the building, except that if no fire department connection is provided, the path of travel shall be measured to the principal entrance of the building.

National Sentence Text: If a portion of a building is completely cut off from the remainder of the building so that there is no access to the remainder of the building, the access routes required by Sentence 3.2.5.5. shall be located so that the unobstructed path of travel from the vehicle to one entrance of each portion of the building is not more than 45 m.
P/T Sentence Text: If a portion of a building is completely cut off from the remainder of the building so that there is no access to the remainder of the building, the access routes required by Sentence  shall be located so that the unobstructed path of travel from the vehicle to one entrance of each portion of the building is not more than 45 m.

National Sentence Text: Every building shall be provided with an adequate water supply for firefighting. (See Note A-3.2.5.7.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided for every building.

National Sentence Text: If a building contains fewer than 9 sprinklers, the water supply for these sprinklers is permitted to be supplied from the domestic water system for the building provided the required flow for the sprinklers can be met by the domestic system.
P/T Sentence Text: If a building contains fewer than nine sprinklers, the water supply for these sprinklers is permitted to be supplied from the domestic water system for the building provided the required flow for the sprinklers can be met by the domestic system.

National Sentence Text: Sprinklers in elevator machine rooms shall have a temperature rating not less than that required for an intermediate temperature classification and shall be protected against physical damage. (See Note A-3.2.5.12.(8).)
P/T Sentence Text: Sprinklers in elevator machine rooms shall have a temperature rating not less than that required for an intermediate temperature classification and shall be protected against physical damage. (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: Combustible sprinkler piping shall meet the requirements of ULC ULC/ORD-C199P-2002 Combustible Piping for Sprinkler Systems
P/T Sentence Text: Combustible sprinkler piping shall meet the requirements of ULC/ORD-C199P, "Combustible Piping for Sprinkler Systems".

National Sentence Text: An automatic sprinkler system shall be installed in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1. if flooring for access within the service space is other than catwalks.
P/T Sentence Text: An automatic sprinkler system shall be installed in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1. if flooring for access within the service space is other than catwalks.

National Sentence Text: The sprinkler system required by Sentence 3.2.5.14. shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices, with each device serving not more than one storey.
P/T Sentence Text: The sprinkler system required by Sentence  shall be equipped with waterflow detecting devices, with each device serving not more than 1 storey.

National Sentence Text: The waterflow detecting devices required by Sentence 3.2.5.14. shall be connected to the fire alarm system, to initiate an alert signal in a 2-stage system or an alarm signal in a single stage system, and indicate separately on the fire alarm system annunciator the actuation of each device.
P/T Sentence Text: The waterflow detecting devices required by Sentence  shall be connected to the fire alarm system to, initiate an alert signal in a two stage system or an alarm signal in a single stage system, and indicate separately on the fire alarm system annunciator the actuation of each device.

National Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to a building of Group A, D, E or F major occupancy classification that is more than 36 m high, measured between grade and the floor level of the top storey, or 18 m high, measured between grade and the floor level of the top storey, and in which the cumulative or total occupant load on or above any storey above grade, other than the first storey, divided by 1.8 times the width in metres of all exit stairs at that storey, exceeds 300, containing a Group B major occupancy in which the floor level of the highest storey of that major occupancy is more than 18 m above grade, containing a floor area or part of a floor area located above the third storey designed or intended as a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, or containing a Group C major occupancy whose floor level is more than 18 m above grade.
P/T Sentence Text: This Subsection applies to a building, of Group A, D, E or F major occupancy classification that is more than, 36 m high, measured between grade and the floor level of the top storey, or 18 m high, measured between grade and the floor level of the top storey, and in which the cumulative or total occupant load on or above any storey above grade, other than the first storey, divided by 1.8 times the width in metres of all exit stairs at that storey, exceeds 300, containing a Group B major occupancy in which the floor level of the highest storey of that major occupancy is more than 18 m above grade, containing a floor area or part of a floor area located above the third storey designed or intended as a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, containing a Group C major occupancy in which the floor level of the highest storey of that major occupancy is more than 18 m above grade, or containing a retirement home, where the floor level of the highest storey of the retirement home is more than 18 m above grade.

National Sentence Text: Except as provided in Article 3.2.4.12. or where there is a conflict with other smoke control measures in the building, air-handling systems used to provide make-up air to public corridors serving suites in a Group C major occupancy shall not shut down automatically upon activation of the fire alarm so as to maintain corridor pressurization.
P/T Sentence Text: (5.1) Except as provided in Article 3.2.4.13. or as otherwise provided in this Part, air handling systems used to provide make-up air to public corridors serving suites in a Group C major occupancy shall not shut down automatically upon actuation of the fire alarm so as to maintain corridor pressurization.

National Sentence Text: Fixed glass windows shall not be used for the venting required by Sentence 3.2.6.6. if the breaking of the windows could endanger pedestrians below.
P/T Sentence Text: Fixed glass windows shall not be used for the venting required by Sentence  if the breaking of the windows could endanger pedestrians below.

National Sentence Text: Openable windows used for the venting required by Sentence 3.2.6.6. shall be permanently marked so that they are easily identifiable.
P/T Sentence Text: Openable windows used for the venting required by Sentence  shall be permanently marked so that they are easily identifiable.

National Sentence Text: Elevator hoistways shall not be designed for the venting required by Sentence 3.2.6.6.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Elevator hoistways shall not be designed for the venting required by Sentence .

National Sentence Text: A voice communication system conforming to Article 3.2.4.22. shall be provided in a building if the floor of the top storey is more than 36 m above grade, or a floor area or part of a floor area located above the third storey is designed or intended for use as a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy.
P/T Sentence Text: A voice communication system conforming to Article 3.2.4.23. shall be provided in a building if, the floor of the top storey is more than 36 m above grade, a floor area or part of a floor area located above the third storey is designed or intended for use as a Group B, Division 2 or 3 occupancy, or a floor area or part of a floor area located more than 18 m above grade is designed or intended for use as a retirement home regulated under the Retirement Homes Act, 2010 that is a Group C occupancy.

National Sentence Text: Emergency lighting to provide an average level of illumination of not less than 10 lx at floor or catwalk level shall be included in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(8).
P/T Sentence Text: Emergency lighting to provide an average level of illumination of not less than 10 lx at floor or catwalk level shall be included,  in a service space referred to in Sentence 3.2.1.1.(9), and  on a shelf and rack storage system, in locations described in Sentence 3.16.1.5.(2).

National Sentence Text: If self-contained emergency lighting units are used, they shall conform to CSA C22.2 No. 141-10 Emergency Lighting Equipment
P/T Sentence Text: If self-contained emergency lighting units are used, they shall conform to CSA C22.2 No. 141, "Emergency Lighting Equipment".

National Sentence Text: Except as required by Article 3.2.7.7., an emergency electrical power supply system for emergency equipment required by this Part for treatment occupancies shall be installed in conformance with CSA Z32-09 Electrical Safety and Essential Electrical Systems in Health Care Facilities (See Note A-3.2.7.6.(1).)
P/T Sentence Text: Except as required by Article 3.2.7.7., an emergency electrical power system for emergency equipment required by this Part for health care facilities shall be installed in conformance with CSA Z32, "Electrical Safety and Essential Electrical Systems in Health Care Facilities". (See Appendix A.)

National Article Title: Emergency Power for Fire Alarm Systems
National Sentence Text: The emergency power supply required by Sentence 3.2.7.8. shall be designed so that, in the event of a failure of the normal power source, there is an immediate automatic transfer to emergency power with no loss of information.
P/T Article Title: 3.2.7.8. Emergency Power for Fire Alarm Systems
P/T Sentence Text: The emergency power supply required by Sentence  shall be designed so that, in the event of a failure of the normal power source, there is an immediate automatic transfer to emergency power with no loss of information.

National Sentence Text: If a fire alarm transponder or annunciator in one fire compartment is connected to a central processing unit or another transponder or annunciator located in a different fire compartment, the electrical conductors connecting them shall be protected in accordance with Sentence 3.2.7.10.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: If a fire alarm transponder or annunciator located in one fire compartment is connected to a central processing unit or another transponder or annunciator located in a different fire compartment, the electrical conductors connecting them shall be protected in accordance with Sentence .

National Sentence Text: Fire alarm system branch circuits within a storey that connect transponders and individual devices need not conform to Sentence 3.2.7.10.(2). (See Note A-3.2.7.10.(7).)
P/T Sentence Text: Fire alarm system branch circuits within a storey that connect transponders and individual devices need not conform to Sentence . (See Appendix A.)

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.7.10.(9), if a distribution panel supplies power to emergency lighting, the power supply conductors leading up to the distribution panel shall be protected in accordance with Sentence 3.2.7.10.(2).
P/T Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence , if a distribution panel supplies power to emergency lighting, the power supply conductors leading up to the distribution panel shall be protected in accordance with Sentence .

National Sentence Text: A floor area containing sleeping rooms in a building of Group B, Division 2 major occupancy shall not be constructed as part of an interconnected floor space.
P/T Sentence Text: A floor area containing sleeping rooms in a building of Group B, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy shall not be constructed as part of an interconnected floor space.

National Sentence Text: If an elevator hoistway opens into an interconnected floor space and into storeys above the interconnected floor space, either the elevator doors opening into the interconnected floor space or the elevator doors opening into the storeys above the interconnected floor space shall be protected by vestibules conforming to Sentence 3.2.8.4.(1).
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentence , where an elevator shaft opens into an interconnected floor space and into storeys that are above such space and that have floor levels more than 18 m above grade, either the elevator doors opening into the interconnected floor space or the elevator doors opening into the storeys above the interconnected floor space shall be protected by vestibules that,  are designed to restrict the passage of contaminated air to the limit described in Sentence 3.2.8.4.(1), and  conform to the requirements of Sentence 3.2.8.4.(3).

National Sentence Text: A building containing an interconnected floor space shall be sprinklered throughout.
P/T Sentence Text: In a building containing an interconnected floor space, storeys that are wholly or partially within an interconnected floor space and all storeys below an interconnected floor space shall be sprinklered.

National Sentence Text: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.5.9.(4), a standpipe system shall be installed in a building that is more than 3 storeys in building height, more than 14 m high measured between grade and the ceiling of the top storey, or not more than 14 m high measured between grade and the ceiling of the top storey but has a building area exceeding the area shown in Table 3.2.5.8. for the applicable building height unless the building is sprinklered throughout.
P/T Sentence Text: Except as provided in Sentences  to , a standpipe system shall be installed in every building that, is more than 3 storeys in building height, is more than 14 m high measured between grade and the ceiling of the top storey, or is not more than 14 m high measured between grade and the ceiling of the top storey but has a building area exceeding the area shown in Table 3.2.9.1. for the applicable building height if the building is not sprinklered.

National Sentence Text: A standpipe need not be installed in a storage garage conforming to Article 3.2.2.90., provided the building is not more than 15 m high.
P/T Sentence Text: A standpipe system is not required to be installed in a storage garage conforming to Article 3.2.2.83. provided the building is not more than 15 m high.
